ResearchProjectDef.label: high powered turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks research for powerful manned turrets that will require ammunition.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Anti-Materiel Turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: Powerful and accurate for long range shots, deals armor-piercing damage.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Howitzer Turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: Long range artillery, has an onboard computer to imporve accuracy. Fires over wall, need to be manned.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Rocket Launcher
ResearchProjectDef.description: Fires 6 rockets at target area with each volley, but has long reload time. Fires over wall, need to be manned.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Laser Turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: Sets target on fire and deals damage as well. 7200W power consumption.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cannon Turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: Mounted with a 120mm tank gun, long range, powerful and accurate. deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit.
